Posts.EditableText:
I tried to post a link to my game-in-development in FaceBook - done it countless times before. But now I'm getting this!

"In response to Australian government legislation, Facebook restricts the posting of news links and all posts from news Pages in Australia. Globally, the posting and sharing of news links from Australian publications is restricted."

Da Fug???
Posts.HTML:
I tried to post a link to my game-in-development in FaceBook - done it countless times before. But now I'm getting this!

Posts.EditableText: I really don't know. Do you live in Australia?
Posts.HTML: I really don't know. Do you live in Australia?

Posts.EditableText: Nope. Orlando, Florida. It's still denying me an ability to post my link to my gaming group. Can someone else give this a try - try to post your game link to Facebook. You can immediately delete it.
Posts.HTML: Nope. Orlando, Florida. It's still denying me an ability to post my link to my gaming group. Can someone else give this a try - try to post your game link to Facebook. You can immediately delete it.
